name: RELOAD (Quickly, Now)
description:
The moon is rising. You awake from your disturbed slumber to hear deep growling from the woods. Running outside into the cold night, you see piercing red eyes approaching in the darkness.

You reach for your pistols...

---

Click the brass bolts, wheels and locks to load each pistol. When the hammer cocks back, you're ready to hit the trigger.  If you don't reload in time, a beast will reach you. If you fail to load the gun fully and try to fire, it will misfire and hurt you!

Music graciously provided by Paws Menu 

Submission for LOWREZJAM 2017
